page.title: 02The Changes in Tibberton.
page.content:
In Tibberton there are some 17th century houses, but most of the old village was built during the l9th century,when Tibberton was owned by the{Duke of Sutherland.}Sutherland estate cottages have pointed gables and most of the modern houses are designed the same way.
At that time Tibberton had four farms and eight cottages, but in the l950's{Maslan Crescent,}forty two semi-detached houses, was built by the District Council.
From l964 onwards Tibberton chang- ed. First many bungalows were built, and then new roads of modern houses.
{Newport}is the local town for shopping, doctor, and secondary schools.
